shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Dawit “Psalter” (fols. 1r-158vb) I-1) Mäzmurä Dawit “Psalms of David” (fols. 1r-122v) I-2) Mäḫalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets” (fols. 123r-136r) I-3) Mäḫalǝyä mäḫalǝy “Song of Songs” (fols. 136r-143v) I-4) Wǝddase Maryam “The Praise of Mary” (fols. 144ra-154vb) I-5) ʾAnqäṣä bǝrhan “The Gate of Light” (fols. 154vb-158vb).

txstates.txstate: The front board is separated from the textblock. Back cover missing, leather spine torn off. Many fols. are worn, some are about to fall apart (along the ruling lines), some stained with dirt; fol. 159 is damaged.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with dark brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: The tooled ornament is poorly visible.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes visible on the spine fold of the quires, one close to the head and one close to the tail of the codex.

squires.squire: I(10/fols. 1r-10v) – II(10/fols. 11r-20v) – III(10/fols. 21r-30v) – IV(10/fols. 31r-40v) – V(10/fols. 41r-50v) – VI(10/fols. 51r-60v) – VII(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 61r-70v) – VIII(12/fols. 71r-82v) – IX(10/fols. 83r-92v) – X(10/fols. 93r-102v) – XI(9; s.l.: 8, stub after 1/fols. 103r-111v) – XII(10/fols. 112r-121v) – XIII(10/fols. 122r-131v) – XIV(12/fols. 132r-143v) – XV(10/fols. 144r-153v) – XVI(6; s.l.: 1, no stub; 2, no stub; 3, stub after 4; 4 stub after 4/fols. 154r-159v).

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data for fol. 2r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-4, I-5: all data for fol. 145r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling is visible; pricking is not visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

phandwritings.phandwriting: Fine, regular, by a trained hand

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra; titles and numbers of the Pss., Canticles and Songs; names of the Hebrew letters and initial lines of each portion in Ps. 118; the second and fourth letters in each line of Ps. 150 and Canticle 10 (fols. 122r; 131v-132v); incipits of each daily portion and of smaller text units in Text I-4; elements of the punctuation signs.
A few lines (alternating with black lines) on the incipit page of Text I-1.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ሰ፡ (ቅ፡) for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት፡ (Text I-4) ወ፡ (ሣ፡) ሰ፡ for ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ይክፈለነ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት፡ (Text I-5)

extras.extra: - A piece of white paper with the title of the Ms. ,ዳዊት, written in blue ink is glued onto the front cover of the Ms. - The Pss. are divided into groups of ten separated by a line of alternating black and red dots. - Numerous glosses and ʾandǝmta-commentaries, in Amharic. - Notes in the margin, not clearly visible: fol. 1r. - Note in the margin exemplifying Saul, Shimei the son of Gera, Absalom and Ahithophel as ungodly people: fol. 11r. - Crude notes: fols. 67v, 110r, 123r. - Part of Ethiopic syllabary, crudely written: fol. 159v.

drawing.info: Fol. 159r: Two priests (?) holding mäqwamiya and ṣänaṣǝl, in the church.

drawing.details: Crude, recent drawings, with crudely written notes beside them.

frames.frame: Fol. 1r (incipit page of Text I-1): uncoloured ornamental band; interlaces, geometric motifs. Fol. 40v: two rows of nine dot asterisks connected with black lines, after Ps. 50. Fol. 41r: uncoloured ornamental band; interlaces, geometric motifs. Fol. 82v: two rows of nine dot asterisks connected with black lines, after Ps. 100. Fol. 83r: three circles with cross-like ornaments inside, with two cross-like ornamental figures between them, before Ps. 101 (fol. 83r) Fol. 122v: row of nine dot asterisks connected with black lines, after Ps. 151. Fol. 123r: coloured (red, black) band; geometric motifs. Fol. 136r: row of nine dot asterisks connected with red and black lines. Fol. 154vb: row of nine dot asterisks connected with red and black lines. Fol. 158vb: row of nine dot asterisks connected with red and black lines.
